description: Bring the party to the beach, BBQ or campground. Tall enough to keep 2L bottles upright, this Coleman® cooler has a beefy 50-quart compartment to stash 84 cans (or a whole lot of potato salad). Insulation in the walls keeps ice chilly up to 3 days in summer temps – excellent for road trips or weekends when you’re a long way from the nearest store. Cup holders give you a safe spot to put your beverage, and the lid is sturdy enough to double as a chair to sit back and toast your prime campsite.Xtreme® technology holds in cold for 3 days in temperatures up to 32°C.ThermoZone™ insulation contains no ozone-depleting CFCs, HFCx or HCFCs.Lid supports up to 113kg (250lb.).4 cup holders are 5cm deep.Beefy wheels and a telescoping handle for easy transportation.
name: Coleman 50 QT Extreme Wheeled Cooler
